abstract: James Stock, a Harvard economist, coined the phrase “the great moderation” while writing a research paper with Mark Watson of Princeton earlier in this decade. You can read the paper — “Has the Business Cycle Changed and Why” — here.

lead_paragraph: James Stock, a Harvard economist, coined the phrase “the great moderation” while writing a research paper with Mark Watson of Princeton earlier in this decade. You can read the paper  “Has the Business Cycle Changed and Why”  here.
